name: Veehickle
description:
Veehickle is a fast paced third person hovercraft combat game. Jump into your homemade hovercraft and survive the hovering horde of enemies!

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**Keyboard/mouse  and controller input supported**

Future Updates:
  • Add in air hovercraft control
  • Upgrade AI behavior/collisions
  • Add deathmatch mode
  • Upgrade "The Trailer Park" map
    • Model crash-able trailers
    • Add exploding barrels
    • Add breakable fences
    • Add interactive grass
  • Upgrade models
  • Add secondary weapon pickup
  • Add secondary map
  • Add secondary enemy
Known Issues:
  • Enemy collisions can cause out of control rotations
    • Can escape bounds if hit correctly
  • Enemies can get stuck on each other or objects during spawn or navigation
  • Gravity/dampening needs tweaking
  • Controller pause button cannot resume game.
  • Player turret aim rotation slightly off
    • Gets fixed to wrong position when camera locks off ground
